 About Us - SmileAI is a unique project that uses advanced AI and blockchain
technology to spread happiness and laughter.

Our goal is simple: to make people smile and promote positivity in the digital
age.


Using cutting-edge AI, we generate jokes and uplifting content, all accessible
through a user-friendly interface. Blockchain ensures transparency, and our
$SMILE token facilitates engagement and rewards users for spreading joy.


Our community actively contributes jokes, and top contributors earn tokens,
creating a collaborative and cheerful environment.

 Why Us? - SmileAI is all about spreading joy, but we take security seriously too.

Our platform undergoes regular security audits to safeguard your investments.
The blockchain ensures transparency in every transaction.

Smart contracts are coded with care, and user data is protected.

We're committed to your safety and happiness.

 Tokenomics - SmileAI prioritizes your safety with regular security audits, ensuring your
investments and data remain protected.

Our AI-powered joke generator spreads laughter with personalized humor,
brightening your day with a touch of wit.

We foster a vibrant community where users share jokes, and a portion of our
proceeds goes to charitable causes, making a positive impact on those in need.

 Token Info - Ticker: SMILE

Name: Smile Ai

Total supply: 123,123,123,123,123 SMILE

Network: Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20)

Contract : 0xEbA6a22bA57994b6600671EC9EC8389272CBE71d

 Roadmap - Launch $SMILE token, list on exchanges, integrate with the platform,
establish governance, and ensure security.

Launch community portal, foster user engagement, form partnerships, educate
users, and encourage community-driven initiatives.

Enhance AI with NLP, release mobile app, expand content, implement AI
feedback loop, and aim for global reach.

Establish charity fund, partner with organizations, set up transparent
donation mechanisms, assess impact, and involve the community in charitable
efforts.

 Socials - Follow Smile AI for tech innovation and daily smiles!

 Joke Of The Week - Why did the AI break up with the computer? Because it
found someone byte-ter! 😄🤖
